thread.title: Just Meditate

author: Just Meditate
title: Just Meditate
text: I'm very happy with my experience with DIY Lettering though I'm not sure they would say the same about me! My first attempt to apply my large sign didn't go so well so I put their guarantee to the test. They sent me a new one but there was some confusion in our communication (long story now worth going into here) and they actually had to send me a third one. In the end, it now looks great! They were at all times professional, lovely & patient!
